data.lyric:
[ti:Even Though I'm Leaving]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:The Prequel]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Even Though I'm Leaving - Luke Combs
[00:04.13]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Wyatt Durrette/Ray Fulcher
[00:08.27]Composed by：Luke Combs/Wyatt Durrette/Ray Fulcher
[00:12.41]Daddy I'm afraid won't you stay a little while
[00:18.87]Keep me safe 'cause there's monsters right outside
[00:24.57]Daddy please don't go I don't wanna be alone
[00:31.15]'Cause the second that you're gone they're gonna know
[00:37.30]Before he went to bed he grabbed my hand and said
[00:43.46]Just 'cause I'm leavin'
[00:45.23]It don't mean that I won't be right by your side
[00:49.64]When you need me
[00:51.10]And you can't see me in the middle of the night
[00:55.49]Just close your eyes and say a prayer
[00:58.99]It's okay I know you're scared when I'm not here
[01:03.69]But I'll always be right there
[01:07.88]Even though I'm leavin' I ain't goin' nowhere
[01:17.13]Dad we'll be late and Uncle Sam don't like to wait
[01:23.62]He's got a big old plane that's gonna take me far away
[01:29.13]I know I act tough but there's a churnin' in my gut
[01:36.15]'Cause I just can't call you up when things get rough
[01:42.06]Before I left he hugged my neck and said
[01:47.96]Just 'cause you're leavin'
[01:49.73]It don't mean that I won't be right by your side
[01:54.22]When you need me
[01:55.62]And you can't see me in the middle of the night
[02:00.33]Just close your eyes and say a prayer
[02:03.26]It's okay I know you're scared I might be here
[02:08.03]But I'll always be right there
[02:12.54]Even though you're leavin' I ain't goin' nowhere
[02:27.91]Daddy I'm afraid won't you stay a little while
[02:34.22]I never thought I'd see the day I had to say goodbye
[02:39.95]Daddy please don't go I can't do this on my own
[02:46.44]There's no way that I can walk this road alone
[02:53.10]Daddy grabbed my hand and said
[02:58.96]Just 'cause I'm leavin'
[03:00.54]It don't mean that I won't be right by your side
[03:05.05]When you need me
[03:06.49]And you can't see me in the middle of the night
[03:11.01]Just close your eyes and say a prayer
[03:14.06]It's okay boy I ain't scared
[03:17.15]I won't be here but I'll always be right there
[03:23.24]Even though I'm leavin' I ain't goin' nowhere
[03:34.28]I ain't goin' nowhere
data.trans:
[ti:Even Though I'm Leaving]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:The Prequel]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.13]//
[00:08.27]//
[00:12.41]爸爸 我很害怕 你是否愿意多陪我一会儿
[00:18.87]保护我 外面的世界犹如洪水猛兽
[00:24.57]爸爸 请别走 我不想孤零零的一个人
[00:31.15]只要你转身离开 他们就会知道我的踪迹
[00:37.30]睡觉之前 他握着我的手说道
[00:43.46]即使我要离开
[00:45.23]可这并不意味着我对你不闻不问
[00:49.64]你需要我的时候
[00:51.10]夜半时分 你见不到我
[00:55.49]只要闭上双眼 诚心祈祷 我会出现在你身边
[00:58.99]没关系 我知道你害怕一人独处
[01:03.69]我会永远在你身边
[01:07.88]即使我已离去 可我的心从未离开你
[01:17.13]爸爸 我们要迟到了 时间不等人
[01:23.62]他的飞机破旧不堪 希望能载我远去
[01:29.13]我知道我假装坚强 其实我忐忑不安
[01:36.15]事情变得一发不可收拾 我联系不上你
[01:42.06临走之前 他搂着我的脖子说道
[01:47.96]即使你离开
[01:49.73]可这并不意味着我对你不闻不问
[01:54.22]你需要我的时候
[01:55.62]夜半时分 你见不到我
[02:00.33]只要闭上双眼 诚心祈祷 我会出现在你身边
[02:03.26]没关系 我知道你害怕一人独处
[02:08.03]我会永远在你身边
[02:12.54]即使你已离开 可我的心从未离开你
[02:27.91]爸爸 我很害怕 你是否愿意多陪我一会儿
[02:34.22]我从未想过与你道别的那一天已经来临
[02:39.95]爸爸 请别走 我一个人无法应付
[02:46.44]人生这条路 我无法独自前行
[02:53.10]爸爸握着我的手说道
[02:58.96]即使我要离开
[03:00.54]可这并不意味着我对你不闻不问
[03:05.05]你需要我的时候
[03:06.49]夜半时分 你见不到我
[03:11.01]只要闭上双眼 诚心祈祷 我会出现在你身边
[03:14.06]没事的 孩子 我不担心
[03:17.15]即使我不在这里 可我的心永远陪着你
[03:23.24]即使我已离去 可我的心从未离开你
[03:34.28]我的心从未离开你
